title: Item Sets In New Client
body:
where's the item sets in the new client? i cant find there, are they not there yet? 
or are they not going to be in the new client?

replies.body: Item Sets are not currently on the updated client, but it's planned per our recent [Update 2 blog](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client-1).  I don't have any eta on when it will go live, but the client devs want to make it happen once everyone has transitioned to the updated version.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=blhI5p06,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-14T17:23:05.079+0000)
>
> Item Sets are not currently on the updated client, but it's planned per our recent [Update 2 blog](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client-1).  I don't have any eta on when it will go live, but the client devs want to make it happen once everyone has transitioned to the updated version.  Hang tight!

Thanks goodness for that. I really use the item set thing a lot for many champions.
